# Package Validation Docs

> Documentation for Package Validation Docs.

*Topics available: 4*

- [Baseline Package Validator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/package-validation/baseline-version-validator.md): Learn about the package validator that validates the latest version of a package with the previous, stable version.
- [Validate Compatible Frameworks Inside a Package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/package-validation/compatible-framework-in-package-validator.md): Learn how to detect issues with API surface, identity, and compatibility across different target frameworks in a package.
- [Validating Different Runtimes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/package-validation/compatible-framework-validator.md): Learn about validating the runtime and compile-time assemblies applicable for supported target frameworks and runtimes.
- [.NET Package Validation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/package-validation/overview.md): Learn how .NET compatibility features can be used to develop consistent and well-formed multi-targeting packages.
